com.regula.documentreader.api

Class DocumentReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.regula.documentreader.api.DocumentReader

  • public final class DocumentReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which provides API for easy MRZ recognizing and results receiving. Takes care of initializing and configuring all necessary resources.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Deprecated. 
      static interface  DocumentReader.RfidReaderRequest
      Interface defining callback object for receiving RFID request data

      • recognizeVideoFrame

        public void recognizeVideoFrame(byte[] frame,
                                ImageInputParam params,
                                DocumentReader.DocumentReaderCompletion completion)
        Use this method to process sequential images (e.g. camera video preview sequential frames)
        Parameters:
        frame - byte array of NV21 image from camera video preview to be processed
        params - parameters of the frame
        completion - callback

        Deprecated. 

      • setProcessParamsFromJson

        public boolean setProcessParamsFromJson(java.lang.String json)
        Use this method to quickly set processing parameters from JSON string. Please, note, that the resulting ProcessParam object will be checked against current DocumentReaderCapabilities so submitted values might be changed.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON string to be used as processing parameters source
        Returns:
        true if received JSON was successfully deserialized, false otherwise

      • showScanner

        public void showScanner(DocumentReader.DocumentReaderCompletion completion)
        Use this method to open camera preview activity using default back camera, which will take care of passing frames to recognition engine and return results when ready

      • showScanner

                        DocumentReader.DocumentReaderCompletion completion)

        Parameters:
        cameraId - ID of the camera to be used for video capturing
        completion - callback
